objects.specification: A broad flat rectangular floor surface with a smooth, lightly textured finish in a neutral light gray color, designed to provide a subtle backdrop and durable underfoot support across the entire classroom floor.
A large flat vertical wall panel with a clean, light pastel finish, smooth surface and sharp edges, providing a neutral background for classroom furnishings and decorative elements.
A large flat vertical wall panel with a clean, light pastel finish, smooth surface and sharp edges, providing a neutral background for classroom furnishings and decorative elements.

A spacious rectangular teacher’s desk with a warm natural wood grain finish, featuring a flat surface, sturdy rectangular legs, clean lines and a subtle matte sheen, conveying a professional yet approachable design.
A wide rectangular blackboard with a deep matte dark surface framed by a slim border, smooth finish to clearly display chalk markings and minimal decorative details.

A tall wooden bookshelf featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves, a warm wood texture with subtle grain detail, simple vertical supports and a slightly glossy finish, designed to hold and display books and materials.
A pair of full-length fabric curtains in a light neutral color with a gentle subtle pattern, featuring soft folds, semi-opaque material and smooth draping for window coverage.
A circular wall clock with a clean white face, simple black numerals and slender hands, housed in a minimal rim and finished with a matte surface to provide clear time display.
An educational poster with glossy finish featuring vibrant, detailed dinosaur illustrations and informative text, mounted on a thin lightweight backing to create an engaging visual display.
